content:
<rule xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset" id="embedded-framework-08300">
            <when>
                <dependency artifactId="micrometer-core" groupId="io.micrometer"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <classification category-id="information" effort="0" title="Embedded framework - Micrometer">
                    <description>The application embeds a Micrometer library.</description>
                </classification>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Micrometer</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
